title: Honor 3
body: So I just got honor 3 today, but it's not showing my loading screen flair. Is it a glitch or do I need to wait or?

replies.body: xXCoDPlayerXx is correct!  You'll need to receive an honor for a ribbon, and it will only remain for one match.  Congrats on level 3!
u need to get honored once by a random to get it for a match.
